availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Jemima Strong. Father of Thomas Strong, John Strong, Jane Strong, Isabel Strong, Malissa Strong, and Wiley Strong. Farmer in Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 42A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 340.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, Precinct 2, p. 400B.
"William Blackburn Strong Jr. (1800-1871)," Find A Grave, Memorial 97451309, accessed August 23, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/97451309.
